questions.question_text:
A company based in Mexico is setting up Dynamics 365 Sales. All price lists are in US dollars (USD).
A sales representative sells products to customers in the United Kingdom and Spain.
You need to determine the currency for the quote.
Which currency will the quote use?

discussion.content: Correct- it will use the currency of the price list (USD)

comments.content: United Kingdom uses Pounds and Spain uses Euro, so it has to be USD to make the conversion imo

discussion.content: You can change the quote currency to EUR if you have configured EUR in currencies settings with an automatically updated exchange rate. WHY NOT EUR?

questions.question_text:
A company has three business units. User privileges are set to ensure that users can see only records owned by their own business unit.
If a contact is needed for all business units, one contact record must be created for each business unit. A contact is considered a duplicate if the First Name, Last
Name, Email or Preferred Phone, and Business Unit fields match.
You must ensure that duplicate records are not created for contacts.
You need to create the duplicate detection rules.
Which two filters should you configure? Each correct answer is part of the complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content: Correct - C looks at email AND BU, and D looks at phone AND BU
above answers are CORRECT i feel , as these combinations covers all criteria for duplicate identification

comments.content: "Business unit" is not listed on criteria, but you can find "Owning business unit" which is the same and sugessted answers are correct.

discussion.content: Why Business Unit? When configuring the duplicate detection rules, you cannot put the BU as part of the selection, the issue that users can see only the BU contacts is done by security roles

choices.C: First Name and Last Name and Email and Business Unit
choices.E: First Name and Last Name and Owner
choices.A: First Name and Last Name and Email
choices.B: First Name and Last Name and Preferred Phone
choices.D: First Name and Last Name and Preferred Phone and Business Unit
